display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dcPDFydY91YQ7kNvwG3QAsG&_nc_oc=AdnGZ00s0jOjrfYTssv32XEaSlIZCl-G8MmWPlVTq6_G6gIq_YCrBjFKewFuAy8ciNc&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYE8MwUQhqJnP9Ksb-Jfm0e6wdiEjUvim_-Ru5h7N_1gCw&oe=67F4C252)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sGdg2RERrBMQ7kNvwFqJv0Z&_nc_oc=AdkFMF99DzkYsI-KSsByS4phDNB2KjQyCdJ5RknNj3QLBFTHeNU-kcquEQt0mg0tIm4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYGjqpAs_LZbb8ZqmKlYR-6s6jsq68TVeQdHFSU-t_BIpQ&oe=67F4C92D)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TBQ7c0AqHxUQ7kNvwFR4JSh&_nc_oc=AdmvD5yJhyYaY3SYjZjTFCVS7Gq5s3V5I3pQLU84CecN6IQrp-ktcKuifxxLejH-cV4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYEJSbFBw_mKOknomDs47M2xnY69Z_Ga28BNySkrp8pzjQ&oe=67F4DD90)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
